games.Name: Wizard101
games.FirstSentence: Wizard101 is one of the first true MMORPGs I ever played
games.RemainingDescription: Released in 2008, I was one of the first players when I was just eight years old. This game enhanced my love for magic, wizards, socialization, and in-game aesthetics. It is deeply nostalgic, and to this day, I still keep up with it when I have time as the community has kept it alive!

games.Name: Counter-Strike 2
games.FirstSentence: I started playing Counter-Strike in 2016
games.RemainingDescription: With the aim of being part of the cool kids in High School. Although they never played with me, I was determined to make the $15 worth it. From there, I built a collection of Counter-Strike skins and became a trading entrepreneur. This game has since become a meditative addiction that helps me de-stress and have fun.

games.Name: Rocket League
games.FirstSentence: Rocket League is like soccer but with flying cars!
games.RemainingDescription: Starting my undergrad, I needed a game that was short, fun, and challenging. A buddy of mine introduced me to this game in the dorm, and I racked up thousands of hours trying to improve. It only took 4 years to achieve my goal of playing ranked with my friend. Now, the soundtracks remind me of great memories.

games.Name: Valheim
games.FirstSentence: Valheim is a classic survival game based on Vikings
games.RemainingDescription: I played this game twice with my university buddy. The retro 3D style, music, and atmosphere create a phenomenal setting for embarking on adventures late into the night. A solid game with a great difficulty curve for solo and multiplayer alike!

games.Name: Hollow Knight
games.FirstSentence: Hollow Knight is a rogue-like game with a fantastic art style
games.RemainingDescription: That I picked up during a reading week in undergrad. Going in blind, I had no idea what to expect except that I was a little bug in an unknown world. The story, narrative, and exploration in this game are fantastic. Itâ€™s a must-play despite my limited hours in it.

games.Name: Grand Theft Auto V
games.FirstSentence: A classic that I played with friends online for fun
games.RemainingDescription: I would play with a University friend just to chat, get cool cars, and explore Los Santos gambling while finding new skins.

games.Name: SpeedRunners
games.FirstSentence: SpeedRunners is a really fast paced swinging game
games.RemainingDescription: With strategy hidden inside. Used to play this all the time in undergrad trying to get faster. Felt really cool to get good at this game!

games.Name: Sea of Thieves
games.FirstSentence: A game truly about skins and vibes
games.RemainingDescription: Played solo just trying to get cool skins and to chill out!

games.Name: Across the Obelisk
games.FirstSentence: A great crawler for deck building
games.RemainingDescription: Played solo just to reach the spire, love card building games!

games.Name: Balatro
games.FirstSentence: Gambling without losing anything
games.RemainingDescription: Loved playing this just because gambling is fun and this made straegy in a chance game viable.

games.Name: SMITE
games.FirstSentence: Tried to get into the Moba style
games.RemainingDescription: Wasn't for me unfortunately but I tried!

games.Name: Divinity: Original Sin 2
games.FirstSentence: Divinity: Original Sin 2 has amazing combat
games.RemainingDescription: Loved playing this with my friend. Honestly better than BG3.

games.Name: Baldur's Gate 3
games.FirstSentence: We played DOS2. Had to play this
games.RemainingDescription: Was really well done and the visuals are amazing. DOS2 Still better though combat wise.

games.Name: V Rising
games.FirstSentence: Great survival/Adventure game with base building
games.RemainingDescription: Played it solo, played it with a friend, fantastic combat with great skisn too

games.Name: Among Us
games.FirstSentence: Clue but less nerdy
games.RemainingDescription: Played during covid, better than no social contact at all!

games.Name: Hades
games.FirstSentence: Mythology meets great illustrations
games.RemainingDescription: Just a fantastic game that I loved playing to get to the end to enjoy the great art.

games.Name: Garry's Mod
games.FirstSentence: Prophunt and TTT
games.RemainingDescription: Just good party game fun.

games.Name: Stardew Valley
games.FirstSentence: Best vibes ever
games.RemainingDescription: Stardew Valley is just a great game to chill with friends and have some fun, espeically during covid.

games.Name: Super Auto Pets
games.FirstSentence: Auto-Battler for quick strategies
games.RemainingDescription: Friend told me about it, great for some flash-game fun.

games.Name: Age of Empires II
games.FirstSentence: Classic city builder
games.RemainingDescription: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition. A beautifully remastered strategy classic that I loved playing to scratch the strategy build itch!

games.Name: Hogwarts Legacy
games.FirstSentence: The OG Wizard101
games.RemainingDescription: If you like Harry Potter you have to play this, got it for that reason.

games.Name: Noita
games.FirstSentence: Pixel active art at its finest
games.RemainingDescription: Noita just lets you be a wizard, destroy things, and every pixel is out to kill you. Fantastic game.

games.Name: Dead Cells
games.FirstSentence: Roguelike with great pixel graphics
games.RemainingDescription: Dead Cells is just a solid platformer game with rogue-like elements and amazing art! A must!

games.Name: Rust
games.FirstSentence: Distopian Anger
games.RemainingDescription: I respect the style and distopian theme of this game but man this game is more like a job. Still fun with the right people though!

games.Name: ShellShock Live
games.FirstSentence: Classic tanks action
games.RemainingDescription: Just a fun tank game with some unique weapons with turn based combat. Very Fun.

games.Name: Crab Champions
games.FirstSentence: Crabrave but actualized
games.RemainingDescription: Silly game that is actually really good. Played with my friend for hours. More Updates Please!

games.Name: Wizard of Legend
games.FirstSentence: Pixel art, wizards, need I say more?
games.RemainingDescription: Wizard of Legend is like Noita but with levels and a fast paced slash/dash style. Just amazing!

games.Name: Palworld
games.FirstSentence: Pokemon, but with guns
games.RemainingDescription: Palworld was supposed to be a joke but is actually really good and satisfies the beastmaster itch while getting pokemon fanst to play games with you.

games.Name: Forts
games.FirstSentence: Best Fort game fight me
games.RemainingDescription: I suck at this game and my friend beats me even when drunk. Still love it to bits. An amazing strategy game to see who can build better but in 2D.

games.Name: FATE
games.FirstSentence: First dungeoncrawler I ever played
games.RemainingDescription: FATE is one of the first dungeon crawelers and it has an unmistakable fantasy vibe. Love it dearly.

games.Name: Raft
games.FirstSentence: Build a raft and survive
games.RemainingDescription: Bootleg Valheim but it did its job.

games.Name: PlateUp!
games.FirstSentence: Isaac and I's fun hell
games.RemainingDescription: Run your own restaurant in PlateUp!. Then die trying to optomize the crap out of it. Still fun especially with my buddy.

games.Name: Slay the Spire
games.FirstSentence: Deck builder reborn
games.RemainingDescription: Classic fantasy deckbuilder that was just fun to keep trying to beat.

games.Name: Vampire Survivors
games.FirstSentence: Makes you feel really powerful
games.RemainingDescription: Face endless waves of enemies in Vampire Survivors. Unlock abilities and survive as long as you can. Break the game and Win! Great game honestly.

games.Name: Risk of Rain 2
games.FirstSentence: A great rogue-like shooter just so detailed
games.RemainingDescription: Fight hordes of enemies in Risk of Rain 2. A fast-paced, multiplayer rogue-like with a unique 3D art style.

games.Name: AVICII Invector
games.FirstSentence: A touching tribute rave in a game
games.RemainingDescription: Soar through musical tracks in AVICII Invector. A rhythm-based music game featuring the iconic hits of AVICII.

games.Name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
games.FirstSentence: CLASSIC first person shooter with so many memories
games.RemainingDescription: Call of Duty: Black Ops is just a great OG split-screen classic with the arcade version and pizza being fantastic.

games.Name: Deep Rock Galactic
games.FirstSentence: ROCK AND STONE
games.RemainingDescription: Team up as dwarves and explore underground caverns in Deep Rock Galactic. Mine resources and fend off alien hordes, have a great time, and be in awe at how great it looks for how small the file size is!

games.Name: GRIS
games.FirstSentence: Art that really makes you think
games.RemainingDescription: Experience a serene and moving journey in GRIS. A visually stunning platformer that explores loss and recovery.

games.Name: Kingdom Two Crowns
games.FirstSentence: Great multiplayer game with a friend
games.RemainingDescription: Build and defend your kingdom in Kingdom Two Crowns. A pixel art strategy game with cooperative multiplayer.

games.Name: Magicka
games.FirstSentence: Just a great vibe with great execution
games.RemainingDescription: Unleash chaotic spells in Magicka. A co-op action-adventure game filled with humor and creative spellcasting.

games.Name: Golf With Your Friends
games.FirstSentence: Mini-golf with friends and chaos
games.RemainingDescription: Compete with your friends in Golf With Your Friends. A fun and challenging multiplayer mini-golf game.

games.Name: Muse Dash
games.FirstSentence: Great rhythm game
games.RemainingDescription: Dance and battle your way through songs in Muse Dash. A vibrant and energetic rhythm game with unique characters.

games.Name: Portal 2
games.FirstSentence: Finished with a friend, great puzzle game
games.RemainingDescription: Solve mind-bending puzzles in Portal 2. A humorous and innovative first-person puzzle game by Valve.

games.Name: SANABI
games.FirstSentence: Great story and mechanics
games.RemainingDescription: Unleash your grappling hook in SANABI. A fast-paced platformer with stylish combat and cyberpunk aesthetics.

games.Name: Tabletop Simulator
games.FirstSentence: Playing boardgames with no world boundaries
games.RemainingDescription: Play any tabletop game with friends in Tabletop Simulator. Create, share, and enjoy endless possibilities.

games.Name: The Impossible Game
games.FirstSentence: Free on xbox and eternal pain included
games.Description: Test your reflexes in The Impossible Game. A minimalist yet challenging platformer with intense gameplay.

games.Name: Guild Wars 2
games.FirstSentence: The best mmorpg out there, my baby and my lover
games.Description: Explore the vibrant world of Tyria in Guild Wars 2. A dynamic MMORPG with stunning visuals and immersive gameplay. I love this game to bits it was the first real mmo I played and it's influence is infused in me.

games.Name: Super Mario Bros. 3
games.FirstSentence: Literally my first game ever. Love it.
games.RemainingDescription: Embark on a nostalgic journey with Super Mario Bros. 3. A timeless platformer that defined an era of gaming.

games.Name: Super Mario Galaxy
games.FirstSentence: Reignited the love for galaxy, stars, and great stories
games.RemainingDescription: Travel across stunning planets in Super Mario Galaxy. A revolutionary platformer that brings gravity-defying gameplay to life.

games.Name: New Super Mario Bros. Wii
games.FirstSentence: Just a well-done mario game with great music
games.RemainingDescription: Jump into the classic Mario experience in New Super Mario Bros. Wii. A fun-filled platformer for friends and family.

games.Name: Mario Kart Wii
games.FirstSentence: Amazing game with untold mechanics
games.RemainingDescription: Rev your engines in Mario Kart Wii. A thrilling racing game with classic tracks, wacky power-ups, and endless fun.

games.Name: Super Smash Bros. Brawl
games.FirstSentence: A classic for house parties
games.RemainingDescription: Battle iconic characters in Super Smash Bros. Brawl. A beloved fighting game with intense multiplayer action.

games.Name: Wii Sports Resort
games.FirstSentence: Who doesn't like Wii Bowiling?
games.RemainingDescription: Experience a variety of exciting sports in Wii Sports Resort. A motion-controlled game that delivers family fun.

games.Name: Club Penguin
games.FirstSentence: One of the best Candian games out there
games.RemainingDescription: Club Penguin was an iconic social multiplayer game. Customize your penguin, decorate igloos, and play games in a vibrant world.

games.Name: Steel Sentinels
games.FirstSentence: A forgotten flashgame that was just so good
games.RemainingDescription: Steel Sentinels is a tactical mech combat game. Command powerful mechs and dominate the battlefield in strategic multiplayer battles.

games.Name: Arcanists
games.FirstSentence: Another amazing yet forgotten turn based flash game
games.RemainingDescription: Cast spells and strategize in Arcanists. A turn-based multiplayer game with magical battles and tactical depth.
